item.title: Brazilian Interactive DTV Applications
item.description: Brazilian DTV standard for interactive applications “Ginga” is now being followed by other South America countries. The standard is usually implemented by big electronics companies and setup-box manufacturers as a middleware service inside their platforms. Applications can be built using a special version of Java TV or NCL (Nested Context Language), the specification covers a wide range of concepts, so the developer should read the ABNT NBR standard before further adventures.
